revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Weapon | name = Assault gun | class = AssaultGunStanding | game = Strife | doomednum = 2006 | convid = 189, 183, 187 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:WeaponGiver|WeaponGiver]]→AssaultGunStanding
A Strife assault gun that stands up, used to make weapon racks. Gives you the assault gun upon pickup. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AssaultGunStanding : {{Class|WeaponGiver}} { {{property|DropItem}} "{{Class|AssaultGun}}" {{property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ASSAULTGUN" // "You picked up the assault gun." States { Spawn: RIFL B -1 Stop } }
